events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle and another car at an intersection causing significant damage.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under auto accident due to keywords related to vehicle collision and damages.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim and facilitate the process.
The claim has been acknowledged by the insurer and the customer was notified about next steps.
The insurer requested police reports, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates from the customer.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police reports and detailed repair quotes.
The claims investigation team began evaluating the evidence related to the auto accident.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the accident was caused by the other vehicle's negligence.
The insurer proposed a settlement amount covering all vehicle repair costs and associated expenses.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the quick response and fair settlement offer from the insurance company.
The insurer officially approved the claim following acceptance of the settlement proposal by the customer.
Settlement payment was processed and issued to the customer's account for vehicle repairs.
The auto accident claim was closed successfully after payment issuance and confirmation of repair completion.
All relevant documentation and case files for the auto accident claim have been archived securely.
